channel.title: Documentation on ShowyEdge
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on ShowyEdge

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: System requirements macOS Catalina (10.15) or later Installation Download dmg file from here. Open a downloaded dmg file. Move ShowyEdge icon into Applications icon. Open ShowyEdge from Launchpad. Menu bar icon will be added. What’s next? Configuration

item.title: Pricing
item.description: ShowyEdge is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.

item.title: Release notes
item.description: ShowyEdge 5.7.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date Mov 4, 2023 ⚡️ Improvements macOS Sonoma support has been improved. The color picker opacity now works correctly on macOS Sonoma. Sparkle Framework has been updated. ShowyEdge 5.6.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date May 14, 2023 ⚡️ Improvements Became sandboxed app. Enabled the setting of Open at login by default. ShowyEdge 5.5.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date May 7, 2022 ⚡️ Improvements Sparkle Framework has been updated.
